court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 4372/2014 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, KODUNGALLUR CRIME NO. 2545/2014 OF KODUNGALLUR POLICE STATION , TRISSUR PETITIONER (S) : P.V.GIRI ADVOCATE, AGED 48 YEARS, S/O. P.C.
full_text: Bests Tal ao 2016/KER/34130 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS THURSDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF AUGUST 2016/13TH SRAVANA, 1938 Cr1.MC.No. 4767 of 2016 () AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 4372/2014 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, KODUNGALLUR CRIME NO. 2545/2014 OF KODUNGALLUR POLICE STATION , TRISSUR PETITIONER (S) : P.V.GIRI ADVOCATE, AGED 48 YEARS, S/O. P.C.VELAPPAN, PATTALI HOUSE, VALAPPAD P.O., CHAVAKKAD TALUK, THRISSUR DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.RAJIT RESPONDENT (S) : 1. STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. 2. SNEHA PRABHA AGED 43 YEARS, D/O. PRAHLADHAN NAIR, VRINDHAVANAM, KODUNGALLUR P.O., THRISSUR DISTRICT-680 664. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR: SMT M T SHEEBA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 04-08-2016 ALONG WITH CRL.M.C.5674/2015, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Piel ao ieee 2016/KER/34130 Crl.MC.No. 4767 of 2016 () APPENDIX PETITIONER (S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE A CERTIFIED COPY OF THE PROCEEDINGS OF THE COURT BELOW DATED 16.1.2015 TO 7.5.2016. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS:NIL True Copy / PA to Judge ieee 2016/KER/34130 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Cri.M.C.Nos.5674 of 2015 and 4767 of 2016 Dated this the 4 day of August, 2016 COMMON ORDER When the matters were taken up, learned counsel for the second respondent submitted that the disputes between the parties have been finally resolved amicably. In the light of above, learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that he does not propose to pursue the Crl.M.Cs. This is recorded and Crl.M.Cs are dismissed as not pressed. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS Judge Sbna/4/8/16 True Copy / P A to Judge
